author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

The `SwitchProducer` currently throws an exception if a Process contains products from earlier Processes that have the same type, module label, and product instance name. The check turns out to be flawed, instead the `BranchDescription`s from earlier/other Processes need to be ignored. There were also two other places that were missing a check of the process name.

The bug was noticed as a unit test failure in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27983#issuecomment-610398078

#### PR validation:

Framework unit tests run.
title: Fix SwitchProducer for products from earlier processes
